front.title: 1076-CONC-1990 The Sense of VASG
front.abstract: For the benefit of individuals using IEEE Standards, this document contains carefully considered opinions, rationales, and conclusions, arrived at by experts in the field, many of whom were part of the original standards-writing group. Committee Conclusions are not developed or processed in accordance with the IEEE Standards Manual, and should not be construed as official Interpretations.
